mapper.select: SELECT * FROM grpwr_chat_room WHERE (employee_num1 = #{employeeNum1} AND employee_num2 = #{employeeNum2}) OR (employee_num1 = #{employeeNum2} AND employee_num2 = #{employeeNum1})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grpwr_chat_room ( room_id, company_num, employee_num1, employee_num2 ) VALUES ( GRPWR_CAHT_ROOM_SEQ.nextval, #{companyNum}, #{employeeNum1}, #{employeeNum2} )
mapper.select: SELECT room_id, company_num, employee_num1, employee_num2 FROM grpwr_chat_room where room_id = (SELECT MAX(room_id) FROM grpwr_chat_room)

SELECT g.msg_id, g.room_id, g.employee_num, g.msg_content, g.send_date, h.employee_name FROM grpwr_chat_message g join hr_employee h on g.employee_num = h.employee_num WHERE g.room_id = #{roomId} and msg_id = (SELECT MAX(msg_id) FROM grpwr_chat_message)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grpwr_chat_message ( msg_id, room_id, employee_num, msg_content, send_date ) VALUES ( GRPWR_CAHT_MESSAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{roomId}, #{employeeNum}, #{msgContent}, sysdate )
mapper.select: select g.MSG_ID, g.ROOM_ID, g.EMPLOYEE_NUM, g.MSG_CONTENT, g.SEND_DATE, h.employee_name from grpwr_chat_message g join hr_employee h on g.employee_num = h.employee_num where room_id = #{roomId} order by g.send_date asc
